tool.name: RebuildMapUnitPolys

param.name: ContactsAndFaults
param.dialogReference: A line feature layer in the active map. If the field IsConcealed is found, the tool will build polygons from only unconcealed lines. Otherwise, all lines will be used.

param.name: MapUnits
param.dialogReference: An existing polygon feature class of map units. The current settings of the layer will be saved to a layer file and restored after the new polygons have been built.

param.name: MapUnit_label_points
param.dialogReference: An optional feature layer of map unit labels (the attributes to be written to the polygons). If no layer is specified, the tool will run Feature to Point on the original polygons featureclass to get label points and write the results to a featureclass in the same workspace as the polygons. That featureclass will be named the same as the polygons featureclass with the suffix '_templabels' appended to it.

param.name: save_copy_of_polygons_
param.dialogReference: If checked, a copy of the original polygon feature class will be saved in the same workspace with the same name followed by a number that increments every time the tool is run. Use this to back up your work.

tool.summary:
A simpler version of the GeMS Make Polys tool

1) Will not build MapUnitPolys from scratch. Use the ArcGIS Feature to Polygon tool for that.

2) Does not concatenate a label points feature class from map units converted to points and an optional label points feature class. It uses one or the other.

3) No error checking between polygon and optional label points attributes. Use colored label points for that.

Use this tool in ArcMap while editing ContactsAndFaults linework to quickly rebuild the MapUnitPolygons feature class as you change the shape of polygons or want to add new ones.

Save or discard your edits before running this tool to stop an active edit session.
